meta.name: Cheer Wool 姿采毛冷
meta.about:
成立於1983年，姿采毛冷現已成為香港其中一間最受歡迎的手工藝及毛冷零售店及批發商.
Established in 1983, Cheer Wool is one of the most renowned yarn and handicraft retailer and wholesaler in HK.
meta.single_line_address: 22nd Floor, Yam Tze Commercial Building, 23 Thomson road, Wan Chai Hong Kong, Hong Kong

meta.name: Cheer Wool
meta.about: We are a craft and yarns shop located in Hong Kong. Please visit our retail shop and our Facebook. For wholesale business, please contact our office.

address.en: 22nd Floor, Yam Tze Commercial Building, 23 Thomson road
